output:
Map {
User Stories {
  Display Puzzles and Brainteasers: 
    As a user, I want to be able to view a list of puzzles and brainteasers.
  Select Puzzle or Brainteaser: 
    As a user, I want to be able to select a puzzle or brainteaser to work on.
  Solve Puzzle or Brainteaser: 
    As a user, I want to be able to solve the puzzle or brainteaser.
  Track Progress: 
    As a user, I want to be able to track my progress on the puzzles and brainteasers.
  Share Progress: 
    As a user, I want to be able to share my progress with friends.
  Receive Rewards: 
    As a user, I want to be able to receive rewards for completing puzzles and brainteasers.
}

UI/UX {
  Design Interface: 
    As a designer, I want to design an intuitive and user-friendly interface for the application.
  Create Visuals: 
    As a designer, I want to create visuals that are engaging and visually appealing.
  Test Interface: 
    As a designer, I want to test the interface to ensure it is easy to use and bug-free.
}

Backend {
  Store Puzzles and Brainteasers: 
    As a developer, I want to store puzzles and brainteasers in a database.
  Track User Progress: 
    As a developer, I want to track user progress on puzzles and brainteasers.
  Generate Rewards: 
    As a developer, I want to generate rewards for users who complete puzzles and brainteasers.
}
}
